Jx.Dialog.Message

Extends: Jx.Dialog

Jx.Dialog.Message is an extension of Jx.Dialog that allows the developer to display a message to the user.  It only presents an OK button.

MooTools.lang Keys

  • message.okButton

Summary
Jx.Dialog.MessageExtends: Jx.Dialog
Options
messageThe message to display to the user
widthdefault width of message dialogs is 300px
heightdefault height of message dialogs is 150px
closeby default, message dialogs are closable
resizeby default, message dialogs are resizable
collapseby default, message dialogs are not collapsible
Functions
setMessageset the message of the dialog, useful for responding to language changes on the fly.

Options

message

The message to display to the user

width

default width of message dialogs is 300px

height

default height of message dialogs is 150px

close

by default, message dialogs are closable

resize

by default, message dialogs are resizable

collapse

by default, message dialogs are not collapsible

Functions

setMessage

setMessage: function(message)

set the message of the dialog, useful for responding to language changes on the fly.

Parameters message - {String} the new message

Extends: Jx.Panel

set the message of the dialog, useful for responding to language changes on the fly.
